string-array.name: create_tables
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `home_thought` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,`userId` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`langId` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL,`categoryId` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL,`groupId` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL,`content` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`image` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`time` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`boost` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `hot_thought` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,`userId` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`langId` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL,`categoryId` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL,`groupId` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL,`content` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`image` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`time` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`boost` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `thought_tag` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,`userId` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`thoughtId` INTEGER NOT NULL,`tagId` INTEGER NOT NULL,`tag` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `thought_comment` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,`userId` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`thoughtId` INTEGER NOT NULL, `replyTo` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,`content` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`time` varchar(255) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `user_msg` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,`senderId` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`recverId` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`time` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`content` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `isRead` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0)

CREATE TABLE `user` (`id` varchar(255) PRIMARY KEY,`userName` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`password` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`FBId` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`firstName` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`lastName` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`timeZone` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL,`email` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`avatar` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`gender` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`age` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL,`birthday` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`countryId` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL,`homeId` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL,`occupation` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`amzExp` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`toDo` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`philosophy` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`friendsDesc` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`interest` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`littleSecret` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`langId` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL,`locale` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`verified` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0)

CREATE TABLE `login_user` (`id` varchar(255) PRIMARY KEY,`userName` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`password` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`FBId` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`firstName` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`lastName` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`timeZone` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL,`email` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`avatar` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`gender` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`age` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL,`birthday` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`countryId` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL,`homeId` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL,`occupation` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`amzExp` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`toDo` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`philosophy` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`friendsDesc` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`interest` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`littleSecret` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`langId` INTEGER DEFAULT NULL,`locale` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,`verified` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `category` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, `name` varchar(255))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `group` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, `name` varchar(255))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `country` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, `name` varchar(255))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `tag` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, `name` varchar(255))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `user_tag` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, `name` varchar(255))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `follow_group` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,`userId` varchar(255) NOT NULL,`groupId` INTEGER NOT NULL,`follow` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `like_tag` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,`userId` varchar(255),`tagId` INTEGER NOT NULL,`tag` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `tag_self` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,`userId` varchar(255),`userTagId` INTEGER,`tag` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1)

resources.string: SELECT t.`id`, t.`userId`, u.`userName`, t.`langId`, t.`categoryId`, c.`name`, t.`groupId`, g.`name`, t.`content`, t.`image`, t.`time`, t.`boost`, COUNT(tc.`id`) FROM `home_thought` AS t LEFT JOIN `user` AS u ON t.`userId` = u.`id` LEFT JOIN `category` AS c ON t.`categoryId` = c.`id` LEFT JOIN `group` AS g ON t.`groupId` = g.`id` LEFT JOIN `thought_comment` AS tc ON t.`id` = tc.`thoughtId` ORDER BY t.time LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
SELECT t.`id`, tt.`tagId`, tg.`name` FROM `home_thought` AS t LEFT JOIN `thought_tag` AS tt ON t.`id` = tt.`thoughtId` LEFT JOIN `tag` AS tg ON tt.`tagId` = tg.`id` WHERE t.`id` = ?
SELECT tc.`id`,tc.`content` FROM `thought_comment` AS tc LEFT JOIN `home_thought` AS t ON tc.`thought_id` = t.`id` WHERE tc.`thoughtId` = ? LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
